pages.text: Guest Info Login open navigation document name: nav section: PPE form code / facility code: insert name: course id / calendar event item id: course name? / calendar event item name?: announcement id: album name: ment id: Private Events Venues for Every Type of Event Whether planning a formal wedding, casual party, corporate outing or business meeting, the Daniel Island Club can provide the venue and attention to detail to ensure success. Our staff is dedicated to helping clients turn their vision into reality. First-class amenities, from an elegant ballroom and spacious boardroom to the Park Club's swim, tennis and fitness facilities, the Club offers numerous indoor and outdoor venues for member-sponsored events of all types and sizes. Get Inspired by our Pinterest Boards Weddings The Daniel Island Club is one of the premier wedding locations in Charleston, SC. Every wedding is considered a custom, one-of-a-kind affair. From large, traditional weddings to small, intimate occasions, our experienced Club staff will ensure that each wedding is personal and unique. Stunning marsh views at the Clubhouse provide an excellent backdrop for any size ceremony, and the elegant bridal room is ideal for on-site weddings. Our Charleston wedding venue has a spacious ballroom, which can seat 300 people for a sit-down dinner and up to 500 for a reception-style event. Request More Info Ballroom Perfect For Your Large Event Members can host large functions, private parties and weddings in the spacious ballroom at the Clubhouse. Equipped with audio/visual equipment with multiple screens, the ballroom can accommodate 300 people for a sit-down dinner and up to 500 for a reception-style event. An adjoining gallery and bar provide a smaller setting for pre-function activities or smaller events. View a Virtual Tour Meetings & Private Functions The Club's ballroom is equipped with state-of-the-art audio/visual equipment and can accommodate up to 500 guests. The adjoining gallery and the Club's boardroom are ideal for smaller gatherings. Exceptional on-site catering services are available for all meetings and private functions. Request More Info Copyright ©2026 by . All Rights Reserved. Private Golf Club sites by | | Daniel Island Club MembersFirst Terms of Use Privacy

Guest Info Login Member open navigation The competition is scheduled for May 2nd through May 6th 2026 and will be the second USGA championship hosted at the Daniel Island Club. 2026 U.S. Women's Amateur Four-Ball Championship Beresford Creek Course Golf Course Architect: Tom Fazio Playing 7,195 yards from the championship tees, the Tom Fazio-designed Beresford Creek course is a Par 72 course that traverses pristine marsh, creeks and waterways providing impressive views and an incredible golfing experience. View Course Tour View Scorecard Ralston Creek Course Golf Course Architect: Rees Jones Against a stunning backdrop of natural saltwater marsh and tidal creek vistas, acclaimed golf course architect Rees Jones has designed a true Lowcountry classic. Ralston Creek, Daniel Island's second 18-hole masterpiece, is a par 72 course playing 7,446 yards from the championship tees. View Course Tour View Scorecard Fitness Aquatics Tennis & Pickleball Club Cottages A Home Away From Home Tastefully appointed, the Club Cottages are designed to be a home away from home for members, visiting family and sponsored guests. Three identical cottages (the Wando, Cooper and Ashley) are named for the rivers surrounding the Charleston area. Indoor & Outdoor Venues Exceptional Facilities And Superior Service The Daniel Island Club is distinguished by its state-of-the-art facilities and first-class service. The golf operations, dining, banquet and meeting facilities are located in the main clubhouse. Aquatics, fitness, and tennis amenities are located just down the road at the Park Club, where you'll also find The Cabana (outdoor covered dining) and a stage for live entertainment. Learn More Join Our Team Apply Today Thank you for your interest in career opportunities at the Daniel Island Club. Our year-round club includes 36 holes of golf, six pickleball courts, two-resort style swimming pools, multiple dining facilities and more! We welcome you to explore more about what it is like working here. Careers Copyright ©2026 by . All Rights Reserved.
